00068 struct pool
00069 {
00070 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00071         static mutex mutex_;
00072 #endif
00073 
00074         typedef boost::singleton_pool<pool, sizeof(char)> pool_t;
00075 
00076         typedef std::list< numeric::interval<long>, fast_pool_allocator< numeric::interval<long> > > pool_lii;  
00078 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00079     static thread_specific_ptr<pool_lii> & plii()    
00080     {
00081         static thread_specific_ptr<pool_lii> plii_;
00082         
00083         return plii_;
00084     }
00085 #else
00086     static std::auto_ptr<pool_lii> & plii()          
00087     {
00088         static std::auto_ptr<pool_lii> plii_;
00089         
00090         return plii_;
00091     }
00092 #endif
00093 
00101         static bool is_from(void * p)
00102         {
00103                 return pool_t::is_from(p);
00104         }
00105         
00106         static void init()
00107         {
00108             if (plii().get() == 0)
00109                 plii().reset(new pool_lii());
00110         }
00111         
00119     static block_base * top(void * p)
00120     {
00121 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00122         mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(mutex_);
00123 #endif
00124 
00125         init();
00126         
00127         pool_lii::reverse_iterator i;
00128         
00129         for (i = plii()->rbegin(); i != plii()->rend(); i ++)
00130             if (in((long)(p), * i))
00131                 break;
00132 
00133         plii()->erase(i.base(), plii()->end());
00134         
00135         return (block_base *)(plii()->rbegin()->lower());
00136     }
00137     
00138         
00146     static void * allocate(std::size_t s)
00147     {
00148 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00149         mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(mutex_);
00150 #endif
00151 
00152         init();
00153         
00154         void * p = pool_t::ordered_malloc(s);
00155         
00156         plii()->push_back(numeric::interval<long>((long) p, long((char *)(p) + s)));
00157         
00158         return p;
00159     }
00160 
00161         
00169     static void deallocate(void * p, std::size_t s)
00170     {
00171 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00172         mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(mutex_);
00173 #endif
00174 
00175         init();
00176         
00177         pool_lii::reverse_iterator i;
00178         
00179         for (i = plii()->rbegin(); i != plii()->rend(); i ++)
00180             if (in((long)(p), * i))
00181                 break;
00182 
00183         plii()->erase(i.base(), plii()->end());
00184         pool_t::ordered_free(p, s);
00185     }
00186 };

00189 mutex pool::mutex_;

00197 class block_base : public sp_counted_base
00198 {
00199 public:
00200     bool init_;                                                                         
00202         intrusive_stack ptrs_;                                                  
00203         intrusive_list inits_;                                                  
00205     intrusive_list::node block_tag_;                                    
00206     intrusive_list::node init_tag_;                                     
00208     block_base() : init_(false)
00209     {
00210         inits_.push_back(& init_tag_); 
00211     }
00212 
00213 protected:
00214     virtual void dispose()                                                  {}                          
00215     virtual void * get_deleter( std::type_info const & ti ) { return 0; }       
00216 };
00217 
00218 
00219 #define TEMPLATE_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) typename T ## n
00220 #define ARGUMENT_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) T ## n const & t ## n
00221 #define PARAMETER_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) t ## n
00222 
00223 #define CONSTRUCT_BLOCK(z, n, text)                                                                                                                                                         \
00224         template <BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, TEMPLATE_DECL, 0)>                                                                                                 \
00225                 text(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, ARGUMENT_DECL, 0)) : elem_(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, PARAMETER_DECL, 0)) {}                                                                                                                                                                                                            
00226 
00231 template <typename T>
00232     class block : public block_base
00233     {
00234         typedef T data_type;
00235 
00236         T elem_;                                                                        
00238     public:
00239         class roofof;
00240         friend class roofof;
00241 
00242                 block() : elem_() 
00243         {
00244         }
00245 
00246         BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(1, 10, CONSTRUCT_BLOCK, block)
00247 
00248 
00249                 
00253         data_type * element()                           { return & elem_; }
00254 
00255         virtual ~block()                                        
00256         { 
00257             dispose(); 
00258         }
00259 
00260     public:
00265         class roofof
00266         {
00267             block * p_;                                                 
00269         public:
00276             roofof(data_type * p) : p_(bp::roofof((data_type block::*)(& block::elem_), p)) {}
00277             
00278                         
00283             operator block * () const { return p_; }
00284         };
00285 
00286         
00294         void * operator new (size_t s)
00295         {
00296             return pool::allocate(s);
00297         }
00298         
00299 
00306         void operator delete (void * p)
00307         {
00308             pool::deallocate(p, sizeof(block));
00309         }
00310     };
00311

00313 template <>
00314     class block<void> : public block_base
00315     {
00316         typedef void data_type;
00317 
00318         long elem_;                                                                     
00320         block();
00321 
00322     public:
00323         class roofof;
00324         friend class roofof;
00325 
00326         data_type * element()                           { return & elem_; }
00327 
00328         virtual ~block()                                        {}
00329         virtual void dispose()                          {}
00330 
00331         virtual void * get_deleter( std::type_info const & ti ) { return 0; }
00332 
00333     public:
00338         class roofof
00339         {
00340             block * p_;                                                 
00342         public:
00349             roofof(data_type * p) : p_(bp::roofof((long block::*)(& block::elem_), static_cast<long *>(p))) {}
00350
